knimeNode.name: Test Data Generator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a data table with all common data types.

intro.p: Creates a data table with all common data types. It creates for each data type extreme values for testing of writer/reader or visualization nodes.

fullDescription.option: The version of the node. Newer versions usually add additional columns.
The total number of rows to create
The number of items the collection columns should contain
The given number is the maximum number of items a set may contain.
The given number is the maximum length for the generated strings.
The number of rows to append to the end of the table that with a missing cell in all columns.
